# Freefall (Feat)
## Overview
You can fall from a great distance and still recover with minor injuries.

**Prerequisites:** Dex 15+, 8+ ranks in [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] (3.5 Tumble) skill, 4+ ranks in [[Climb (Skill)|Climb]] skill, [[Toughness (Feat)|Toughness]].

**Benefit:** You suffer half damage from falls up to 100 ft. Beyond that, this feat does not protect you. 

**Source:** Feats (AEG), pg. 39
